title: Caught! Meryl Streep Applauds Pizzagate Pedophile

organizations.name: meryl streep applauds pizzagate pedophile actress

text:
Caught! Meryl Streep Applauds Pizzagate Pedophile Actress previously praised convicted child rapist Alex Jones | Infowars.com - January 9, 2017 Comments 
Meryl Streep, who recently used her platform at the Golden Globes to bash President-elect Donald J. Trump, gave convicted rapist Roman Polanski a standing ovation when he won the Academy Award for Best Director for “The Pianist” in 2003. 
It seems that Streep has no tolerance for Trump “bullying” a reporter, which has been proven time and time again to be false, but will go as far to stand in adoration of a “child rapist”. 
This is why conservatives hate Hollywood. 
Meryl Streep Trump Attack: What They Aren’t Telling You
